statements: SELECT * FROM travel_insurance_policy;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE coverage_limit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM travel_insurance_policy ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_payment FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE renewal_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT AVG(coverage_limit) AS average_coverage FROM travel_insurance_policy;
SELECT * FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE coverage_limit > 5000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_payment FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE premium_payment < 1000;
SELECT * FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY coverage_limit ASC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, premium_payment FROM travel_insurance_policy WHERE premium_payment > 2000 AND coverage_limit < 10000;
SELECT MAX(coverage_limit) AS max_coverage FROM travel_insurance_policy;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_limit FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, renewal_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_limit > 50000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_payment < 1000;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM policy_holders;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_limit > 5000 ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_payment FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_payment BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_email, holder_address FROM policy_holders JOIN insurance_policies ON policy_holders.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE renewal_date < '2022-01-01' AND coverage_limit BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;

SELECT holder_name, SUM(coverage_limit) AS total_coverage FROM policy_holders JOIN insurance_policies ON policy_holders.policy_id = insurance_policies.policy_id GROUP BY holder_name HAVING total_coverage > 10000 ORDER BY total_coverage DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM PolicyDetails ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalDates WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limits->>'limit', premium_amount FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_amount < 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount_paid < 200 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date, next_renewal_date FROM RenewalDates WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY next_renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limits->>'personal_injury' as personal_injury_limit FROM PolicyDetails WHERE coverage_limits->>'property_damage' > '5000' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, renewal_date FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_payment > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit, renewal_date FROM PolicyDetails ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT policy_id, SUM(premium_payment) AS total_payment FROM PolicyDetails GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_payment > 1000;
SELECT * FROM coverage_limits;
SELECT coverage_name, max_coverage_amount FROM coverage_limits WHERE max_coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT user_id, renewal_date FROM policy_details ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT p.user_id, u.user_name, p.premium_amount, r.renewal_date FROM policy_details p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN renewal_dates r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id;

SELECT u.user_name, c.coverage_name, p.premium_amount FROM users u JOIN policy_details p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN coverage_limits c ON p.coverage_id = c.coverage_id WHERE p.premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT r.renewal_date, SUM(r.renewal_amount) AS total_renewal_amount FROM renewal_dates r GROUP BY r.renewal_date ORDER BY total_renewal_amount DESC;
